Class SankoffAlg

  • java.lang.Object
    • fitchcost.SankoffAlg

  • public class SankoffAlg
extends java.lang.Object
    Implements the Sankoff Algorithm.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SankoffAlg

        public SankoffAlg(byte[] chars,
                  byte ignoreChar,
                  SankoffAlgVertex root)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        chars - character allowed in the sequences (can be null - the alg. will consider all except for ignore char)
        ignoreChar - a character that is ignored in the sequences
        root - the root of the input tree
